The Healer's Setback 

 Vaccination was built on a foundation
 To protect the people in this nation.
 Like the huge debate with Mather
 Comes forth again the same matter.
 Fast forward 300 years 
 And here we have the same old fears.
 Why have we still to debate 
 About a conflict that abates 
 The very weapons that could have ended us? 


Today, we fight against the very science and technology 
 That has helped us countlessly 
 With our everyday lives, 
 As if we curse our own aegis.
 Why do we reach for the stars 
 Only to reject the very results we seek? 
 Why do we have to prove the healer’s credibility 
 When science has consummated its powers already? 
 What can we do to mold this stone wall of rigidity? 


The best we can do is spread our wisdom 
 To eliminate all the harms from our system 
 And to those who think the healer harms, 
 And disapprove of its charms, 
 Believe in science, 
 Believe in research, 
 Believe in human advancement. 
 Don’t let this dogma become an attachment. 
 Keep an open mind 
 And help us survive 
 Overcome adversities 
 And continue to thrive.
